resources.string:
"This application cannot extract this file.
The following limitations apply: \u2022 Inno Setup 1.2.10 to 5.5.8 \u2022 Encrypted installers are not supported
Please check that your file is a valid Inno Setup file."

"Unable to write to directory.
Please choose another directory and ensure that the application has permission to write to external storage."
Permission is required to read external storage in order to extract
This tool will unpack installers created with Inno Setup only. It will NOT:
Run or install Windows programs or games
